01=QnCl[?h3x-PVIz|0|: I think you should take a break...
If I were you, I would choose to stop...
Hey, kid, aren't you tired? Maybe we can talk?
Please tell me why you are here.
You destroyed all this! It's all destroyed!
Okay, why do some people just insist?
Maybe in another world, we're friends!But now...
In this world, everyone lives happily! So I want to protect here! I won't let you destroy this AU!
But because of you, a beautiful world will never come!

为了方便手机端，将Z键与空格连用

MESSAGE: It must be your first time to underground world, right?
You need someone to teach you the rules of the game!
I'm not good at it, but only me here.
See this heart? This is your soul,it's the essence of your life!
At first,your soul was weak, but as LV improves,your soul becomes stronger and stronger.
Why do you ask LV? What's the problem?it's LOVE, of course!
Don't worry, I'll give you some.
In the underground world, the transfer of LOVE is through…
Move! Pick up as much as you can!
In this world,killing or being killed.
Are you kidding me?Are you mentally disabled? To hit -- the bullet!!!
Are you kidding me?Are you mentally disabled? To hit -- the “Particles of friendship”!!!
You know what's going to happen, right?
You just want to watch me suffer.
